content.question: Year Number of Vehicles ​(thousands) 1996 <math alttext="265.0"><semantics><mn>265.0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 1998 <math alttext="295.0"><semantics><mn>295.0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2000 <math alttext="394.7"><semantics><mn>394.7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2002 <math alttext="471.1"><semantics><mn>471.1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2004 <math alttext="565.5"><semantics><mn>565.5</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2006 <math alttext="634.6"><semantics><mn>634.6</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2008 <math alttext="775.7"><semantics><mn>775.7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> 2010 <math alttext="938.6"><semantics><mn>938.6</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​ ​The table gives the number of alternative-fuel vehicles, in thousands, in use in the United States for selected years from 1996 to 2010. The function <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> defined by <math alttext="A open parentheses t close parentheses equals fraction numerator 4615 t minus 8727 over denominator negative 0.542 t squared plus 15 t plus 1 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4615</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>8727</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>0.542</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is used to model the data, in thousands, for <math alttext="6 less or equal than t less or equal than 20"><semantics><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="t equals 6"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> corresponds to 1996. Which of the following could be a plot of the residuals of the model?

choices.label: The x axis is labeled Year and ranges from 0 to 22 in increments of 2. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from negative 55 to 35 in increments of 5. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates: (6 comma negative 1) (8 comma negative 32) (10 comma 8) (12 coma 18) (14 comma 32) (16 comma negative 2) (18 comma negative 3) (20 comma negative 53)

The x axis is labeled Year and ranges from 0 to 22 in increments of 2. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from negative 35 to 55 in increments of 5. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates: (6 comma 1) (8 comma 32) (10 comma negative 8) (12 coma negative 18) (14 comma negative 32) (16 comma 2) (18 comma 3) (20 comma 53)

The x axis is labeled Year and ranges from 0 to 22 in increments of 2. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from 0 to 1,000 in increments of 100. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates: (6 comma 270) (8 comma 320) (10 comma 390) (12 comma 450) (14 comma 540) (16 comma 650) (18 comma 780) (20 comma 980)

The x axis is labeled Year and ranges from 0 to 22 in increments of 2. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from 0 to 1,000 in increments of 100. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates: (6 comma 270) (8 comma 300) (10 comma 400) (12 comma 470) (14 comma 570) (16 comma 630) (18 comma 780) (20 comma 940)

content.answer: The x axis is labeled Year and ranges from 0 to 22 in increments of 2. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from negative 55 to 35 in increments of 5. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates: (6 comma negative 1) (8 comma negative 32) (10 comma 8) (12 coma 18) (14 comma 32) (16 comma negative 2) (18 comma negative 3) (20 comma negative 53)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
